name: Tappy Town
storyline:
Surf through your way over obstacles in your way in this action platformer! Crossing each obstacle by jumping preciously. Push your skills to the limit as you jump,your way through dangerous traffic cones, mail boxes, dustbins, cars, trains and many deadly obstacles. Simple one touch game play with lots of levels that will keep you entertained for hours!
Game Features-
• Simple one touch control
• Simple, pure, innovative gameplay
• Challenge yourself with the near impossible
• Lots of achievements and rewards
• Unlock new characters and boards customize your gameplay
• Lots of levels with unique soundtracks
summary: Surf through your way over obstacles in your way in this action platformer! Crossing each obstacle by jumping preciously. Push your skills to the limit as you jump your way through dangerous traffic cones, mail boxes, dustbins, cars, trains and many deadly obstacles.
